title: オールカマーの後に・勝って、爆走

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew, I beat Turbo! Yay yay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, Turbo was amazing today. It was a race where you could really feel her determination to win~

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Speak of the devil!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I'm so mad, so mad, so mad! I was so close to winning~~!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Waaah~~~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa. She's running off with incredible speed...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait, the station isn't that way, right!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: T-Turbo! Wait a sec~!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Next time, Turbo will definitely win for sure~~! Waaah~~~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Turbo, that way is Ibaraki~!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I can't go on anymore~...!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Huh? Where is this?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whew~, found you! I lost sight of you on the way and panicked!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Machitan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The academy isn't this way~. Wrong way!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There's a bus stop over there, let's take it back!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Waaah! I'm so glad Machitan came, I was so scared~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, good, good...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Right, are you thirsty?
I have juice.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Throat... thirsty!
Drink juice!
After that, it was Matikanetannhauser who carried the tired, sleeping Twin Turbo home on her back.
